name: chrysalis-os-scripts
description: Development and testing scripts for Chrysalis OS
//_info: Utility scripts used during Chrysalis OS development

scripts.create-i: cd .. ; make -C installer clean ; make -C installer
scripts.auto-i: make clean ; make ; cd .. ; make -C installer clean ; make -C installer ; cd os ; npm run installer:log
scripts.boot1: clear && qemu-system-i386 -m 256 -smp 2 -boot order=c -nographic -monitor none -serial stdio -drive file=hdd.img,format=raw,if=none,id=disk0 -device ahci,id=ahci -device ide-hd,drive=disk0,bus=ahci.0 -netdev user,id=net0 -device e1000,netdev=net0
scripts.iso-up: cd .. && make -C installer clean && make -C installer
scripts.build: clear && make clean && make dirs && make && make iso
scripts.//_run-serial: Run with serial output redirected to stdio
scripts.//_run-debug: Log hardware interrupts in real time
scripts.//_storage: Run with raw HDD image attached
scripts.run:hdd: clear && qemu-system-i386 -audiodev pa,id=snd0 -machine pcspk-audiodev=snd0 -m 256 -smp 2 -boot order=d -cdrom chrysalis.iso -serial stdio -drive file=hdd.img,format=raw,if=none,id=disk0 -device ahci,id=ahci -device ide-hd,drive=disk0,bus=ahci.0 -device piix3-usb-uhci -netdev user,id=net0 -device e1000,netdev=net0 -vga std
scripts.//_installer: Boot installer.iso with hdd.img attached (IDE, for ATA installer)
scripts.installer: clear && qemu-system-i386 -audiodev pa,id=snd0 -machine pcspk-audiodev=snd0 -m 256 -smp 2 -boot order=d -cdrom ../installer/installer.iso -serial stdio -drive file=hdd.img,format=raw,if=ide -device piix3-usb-uhci -netdev user,id=net0 -device e1000,netdev=net0 -vga std
scripts.installer:ahci: clear && qemu-system-i386 -audiodev pa,id=snd0 -machine pcspk-audiodev=snd0 -m 256 -smp 2 -boot order=d -cdrom ../installer/installer.iso -serial stdio -drive file=hdd.img,format=raw,if=none,id=disk0 -device ahci,id=ahci -device ide-hd,drive=disk0,bus=ahci.0 -device piix3-usb-uhci -netdev user,id=net0 -device e1000,netdev=net0 -vga std
scripts.installer:log: sh -c 'mkdir -p logs && qemu-system-i386 -audiodev pa,id=snd0 -machine pcspk-audiodev=snd0 -m 1024 -smp 2 -boot order=d -cdrom ../installer/installer.iso -serial stdio -drive file=hdd.img,format=raw,if=ide -device piix3-usb-uhci -netdev user,id=net0 -device e1000,netdev=net0 -vga std | tee logs/installer-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).log'
scripts.boot: clear && qemu-system-i386 -audiodev pa,id=snd0 -machine pcspk-audiodev=snd0 -m 256 -smp 2 -boot order=c -serial stdio -drive file=hdd.img,format=raw,if=none,id=disk0 -device ahci,id=ahci -device ide-hd,drive=disk0,bus=ahci.0 -device piix3-usb-uhci -netdev user,id=net0 -device e1000,netdev=net0 -vga std
scripts.create:boot-iso: clear && npm run build && make -C ../installer clean && make -C ../installer
scripts.run:tpm: sh -c 'rm -f swtpm.sock && mkdir -p tpm && swtpm socket --tpmstate dir=tpm --ctrl type=unixio,path=swtpm.sock & sleep 0.2 && qemu-system-i386 -m 64 -boot order=d -cdrom chrysalis.iso -drive file=hdd.img,format=raw -chardev socket,id=chrtpm,path=swtpm.sock -tpmdev emulator,id=tpm0,chardev=chrtpm -device tpm-tis,tpmdev=tpm0'
scripts.nm:check: echo '== ata.o ==' && nm -g build/ata.o | grep ata_read_sector || true && echo '== fat_fs.o ==' && nm -u build/fat_fs.o | grep ata_read_sector || true
